title: Residential Treatment Programs
description: These are often expensive and typically short - term, usually lasting no more than 30 days.

title: Detox Centers
description: Inpatient facilities that are designed to assist patients with the physical detoxification of drugs from their bodies.

title: Free-Standing MAT Clinics
description: Offers a full array of treatment support, including medication, counseling, and co-occurring mental illness treatment.

title: Primary Care Providers
description: Prescribes medications to treat cravings, typically without accompanying counseling.

title: Methadone Clinics
description: Fixed site facilities that typically require patients to appear for daily medication dosing.
